thread.title: Jeremy Corbyn appoints top advisor who once defended terrorism
thread.title_full: Jeremy Corbyn appoints top advisor who once defended terrorism

author: Kate McCann
title: Jeremy Corbyn appoints top advisor who once defended terrorism
text: Politics Jeremy Corbyn appoints top advisor who once defended terrorism Seumas Milne, a left-wing journalist who gave Osama Bin Laden a byline, is the Labour leader's new communications chief Jeremy Corbyn is understood to have appointed the Guardian's Seumas Milne Photo: Heathcliff O'Malley/The Telegraph By Kate McCann , Senior Political Correspondent 7:12PM BST 20 Oct 2015
